meanings.definition: A stone believed to have magical or medicinal properties, often thought to be found in the head of a toad.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that carrying a toadstone can bring good luck.
meanings.sent2: The toadstone was carefully placed on the shelf among other mystical objects.
meanings.sent3: The wizard's toadstone glowed brightly when he cast a spell.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace shimmered like a toadstone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The toadstone's energy seemed to pulse in the palm of his hand.

meanings.definition: A fossilized fish tooth or spine, resembling a toadstone.
meanings.sent1: The toadstone fossil was carefully examined by the paleontologist.
meanings.sent2: In the museum, visitors marveled at the ancient toadstone on display.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the toadstone fossil was a magical artifact.
meanings.sent4: The toadstone fossil's shape reminded her of a tiny toad perched on a rock.
meanings.sent5: The toadstone fossil held secrets of the prehistoric ocean within its structure.
